text: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمْ كَانَت تَّأْتِيهِمْ رُسُلُهُم بِٱلْبَيِّنَـٰتِ فَكَفَرُوا۟ فَأَخَذَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ قَوِىٌّ شَدِيدُ ٱلْعِقَابِ

translation.en.sahih: That was because their messengers were coming to them with clear proofs, but they disbelieved, so Allah seized them. Indeed, He is Powerful and severe in punishment.
translation.id.indonesian: Yang demiklan itu adalah karena telah datang kepada mereka rasul-rasul mereka dengan membawa bukti-bukti yang nyata lalu mereka kafir; maka Allah mengazab mereka. Sesungguhnya Dia Maha Kuat lagi Maha Keras hukuman-Nya.
